alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 7:05PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Scotland affecting Hutchinson, Yankton and Bon Homme Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, approximately 4400 acres of farm land are flooded between Mitchell and Yankton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue rising to 14.7 feet Monday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Scotland 13.0 11.5 Mon 7 pm 12.0 12.5 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening at 1015 PM CDT.
